name: Hotwife Community TG
tagline: Dedicated hotwife lifestyle group for couples and singles
description: Hotwife Community TG is a focused group for the hotwife lifestyle community on Telegram. The group caters to couples interested in or practicing the hotwife lifestyle, providing a space for discussion, content sharing, and connections. Strict rules about consent and verification help maintain a quality community. Educational content about the lifestyle is regularly shared.
